anya-e1203n:302: Gantvā so dhammarājā vanamisipatanaṃ saññatānaṃ niketaṃ,
anya-e1203n:310: Obhāso pātubhuto sapadi bahuvidhaṃ āsi accherakañca.
anya-e1203n:313: Tato paṭṭhāya so satthā vinento devamānuse,
anya-e1203n:319: Yakkhānaṃ samitiṃ gantvā ṭhatvāna gagane tahiṃ;
anya-e1203n:335: Datvā namassituṃ kese agā jetavanaṃ jino.
anya-e1203n:380: So satthā sumane kūṭe dassesi padalañchanaṃ.
anya-e1203n:413: Subhaddaṃ majjhime yāme pāpetvā amataṃ padaṃ.
anya-e1203n:427: Ahatehi ca vatthehi veṭhetvā paṭhamaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e1203n:440: Citakaṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu gāhāpetuṃ hutāsanaṃ.
anya-e1203n:449: Na masi satthudehassa daḍḍhassāsi na chārikā.
anya-e1203n:454: Uṇhīsaṃ akkhakā dve ca catasso dantadhātuyo;
anya-e1203n:455: Iccetā dhātuyo satta vippakiṇṇā na satthuno.
anya-e1203n:476: Gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṃ.
anya-e1203n:481: Dantadhātuṃ tato khemo attanā gahitaṃ adā;
anya-e1203n:484: Desayitvāna so dhammaṃ bhetvā sabbā kudiṭṭhiyo;
anya-e1203n:562: Taṃ dhātuṃ pūjayitvāna rājāno pubbakā idha;
anya-e1203n:566: Pūjayanti samāgamma dhātuṃ taṃ satthuno iti.
anya-e1203n:568: Tassāmaccassa so rājā sutvā dhammaṃ subhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1203n:571: Dhātupūjaṃ karonto so rājā acchariyā vahaṃ;
anya-e1203n:578: Pabbājesi sakā raṭṭhā nigaṇṭhe te asesake.
anya-e1203n:593: Nindanno tādise deve chavaṭṭhiṃ vandate iti.
anya-e1203n:599: Pūjitaṃ taṃ chavaṭṭhiñca tena rattindivaṃ iti.
anya-e1203n:607: Sutvā āgamanaṃ tassa kaliṅgo so mahipati;
anya-e1203n:616: Tato so sumano gantvā paviṭṭho rājamandiraṃ;
anya-e1203n:632: Jano hi avajānanto addhā so vañcito iti.
anya-e1203n:638: Tena saddhiṃ mahagghaṃ taṃ agamā dhātumandiraṃ.
anya-e1203n:684: Accheraṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ cittayāno narindo,
anya-e1203n:691: Taṃ sāsanaṃ paṇḍunarādhipassa ñāpesi dhīro duratikkamaṃ’ti.
anya-e1203n:693: Rājātato dantapuraṃ dhajehi pupphehi dhūpehi ca toraṇehi;
anya-e1203n:697: Samubbahanto sirasā nijena mahārahaṃ dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ taṃ.
anya-e1203n:708: Kaliṅghanātho kusumādikehi naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
anya-e1203n:709: Dine dine addhani dantadhātuṃ pūjesi saddhiṃ vanadevatāhi.
anya-e1203n:712: Ādāya dhātuṃ manujādhinātho agā puraṃ pāṭali puttanāmaṃ.
anya-e1203n:714: Rājādhirājo’tha sabhāya majjhe disvāna taṃ vītabhayaṃ visaṅkaṃ;
anya-e1203n:724: Mohandhabhutā atha titthiyā te taṃ dantadhātuṃ abhinikkhipiṃsu.
anya-e1203n:729: Tasmiṃ khaṇe paṅkaja kaṇṇikāya patiṭṭhahitvā jinadantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:730: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbā disā pabhāsesi pabhassarāhi.
anya-e1203n:732: Disvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ manussā pasannacittā ratanādikehi;
anya-e1203n:735: So paṇḍurājā pana diṭṭhijālaṃ cirānubaddhaṃ apariccajanto;
anya-e1203n:739: Pubbācalaṭṭho’va sudhāmarīci jotesi raṃsīhi disā samantā.
anya-e1203n:741: Disvānubhāvaṃ jinadantadhātu yāpajji so vimbhaya maggarājā;
anya-e1203n:742: Eko’tha issāpasuto nigaṇṭho taṃ rājarājānamidaṃ avoca.
anya-e1203n:744: Rāmādayo deva janaddanassa nānāvatārā bhuvane ahesuṃ;
anya-e1203n:747: Addhā manussattamupāgatassa devassa pacchā tidivaṃ gatassa;
anya-e1203n:754: Yaṭicchitaṃ gaṇhatha vatthujātaṃ iccāha rājā mukhare nigaṇṭhe.
anya-e1203n:756: Te titthiyā viṇahusuraṃ guṇehi vicitta rūpehi abhitthavitvā;
anya-e1203n:757: Toyena siñciṃsu saṭhā tathāpi ṭhitappadesā na calittha dhātu.
anya-e1203n:759: Jigucchamāno atha te nigaṇṭhe so dhātuyānīharaṇe upāyaṃ;
anya-e1203n:760: Anvesamāno vasudhādhinātho bheriṃ carāpesi sake puramhi.
anya-e1203n:766: Tasmiṃ pure seṭṭhisuto subhaddo pāvekkhirañño samitiṃ pagabbho.
anya-e1203n:768: Tamaggarājaṃ atha so namitvā sāmājikānaṃ hadayaṅgamāya;
anya-e1203n:771: Bhumiṃ kiṇitvā mahatā dhanena manoramaṃ jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ;
anya-e1203n:772: Yo kārayitvāna jinassa datvā upaṭṭhahi taṃ catupaccayehi.
anya-e1203n:780: Chaddantanāgo savisena viddho sallena yo lohitamakkhi taṅgo;
anya-e1203n:781: Chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi samujjalante chetvāna luddāya adāsi dante.
anya-e1203n:786: Yo bodhiyā bāhiravatthudānā atittarūpo sivirāja seṭṭho;
anya-e1203n:787: Adāsi cakkhūni pabhassarāni dvijāya jiṇṇāya acakkhukāya.
anya-e1203n:792: Yo dhammapālo api sattamāsa jātopaduṭṭhe janakesakamhi;
anya-e1203n:793: Kārāpayante asimālakammaṃ cittaṃ na dūsesi patāparāje.
anya-e1203n:795: Sākhāmigo yo asatā pumena vane papātā sayamuddhaṭena;
anya-e1203n:796: Silāya bhinne’pi sake lalāṭe taṃ khemabhumiṃ anayitthamūḷhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:799: Samuṭṭhite sajjumahāravinde ṭhatvāna yo seṭṭhi adāsi dānaṃ.
anya-e1203n:804: Yo sattavasso visikhāya paṃsu kīḷāparo sambhavanāmako’pi;
anya-e1203n:807: Hitvā nikantiṃ sakajīvite’pi baddhāsakucchimhi ca vettavalliṃ;
anya-e1203n:811: Isī’va katvā atha ñāyaganthaṃ nijaṃ pavattesi cirāya dhammaṃ.
anya-e1203n:825: Buddho bhavitvā api diṭṭhadhamma sukhānapekkho karuṇānuvattī;
anya-e1203n:829: Ajeyyasatthaṃ paramiddhipattaṃ damesi yo ālavakampī yakkhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:832: Bhetvāna diṭṭhiṃ sucirānubaddhaṃ damesi yo brahmavaraṃ munindo.
anya-e1203n:838: Mahādayo duppasahaṃ parehi damesi yo aṅgulimālacoraṃ.
anya-e1203n:841: Saddhamma saññaṃ ratanākarañca ogāhayī saṃ parisaṃ samaggaṃ.
anya-e1203n:846: Anena saccena jinassa dhātu khippaṃ samāruyha nabhantarāḷaṃ;
anya-e1203n:849: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā jinadantadhātu nabhaṃ samuggamma pabhāsayantī;
anya-e1203n:850: Sabbā disā osadhitārakā’va janaṃ pasādesi vtiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:852: Athotaritvā gaganaṅgaṇamhā sā matthake seṭṭhisutassa tassa;
anya-e1203n:855: Dasvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ nigaṇṭhā iccabravuṃ paṇḍunarādhipaṃ taṃ;
anya-e1203n:856: Vijjābalaṃ seṭṭhisutassa etaṃ na dhātuyā deva ayampabhāvo.
anya-e1203n:858: Nisamma tesaṃ vacanaṃ narindo iccabravī seṭṭhisutaṃ subhaddaṃ;
anya-e1203n:859: Yathā ca ete abhisaddaheyyuṃ tathāvidhaṃ dassaya iddhimaññaṃ.
anya-e1203n:864: Sā rājahaṃ sī’va vidhāvamānā sugandhitoyamhi padakkhiṇena;
anya-e1203n:865: Ummujjamānā ca nimujjamānā jane pamodassudhare akāsi.
anya-e1203n:867: Tato ca kāsuṃ visikhāyamajjhe katvā tahiṃ dhātumabhikkhipitvā;
anya-e1203n:868: Paṃsūhi sammā abhipūrayitvā bahūhi maddāpayi kuñjarehi.
anya-e1203n:874: Obhāsayanti’va disā pabhāhi diṭṭhā muhuttena jinassadhātu.
anya-e1203n:876: Khipiṃsu vatthābharaṇāni maccā pavassayuṃ pupphamayañca vassaṃ;
anya-e1203n:877: Ukkuṭṭhisaddehi ca sadhukāranādehi puṇṇaṃ nagaraṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1203n:879: Te titthiyā taṃ abhivañcanaṃ’ti rājādhirājaṃ atha saññapetvā;
anya-e1203n:880: Jigucchanīye kuṇapādikehi khipiṃsu dhātuṃ parikhāya piṭṭhe.
anya-e1203n:883: Madhubbatālī virutābhirāmā ahosi sā pokkharaṇī’va nandā.
anya-e1203n:885: Gajādhipā koññcaravaṃ raviṃsu kariṃsu hesāninadaṃ turaṅgā;
anya-e1203n:889: Vatthāni sīse bhamayiṃsu mattā bhujāni poṭhesumudaggacittā.
anya-e1203n:895: Atthe niyojetu mupecca tassa vadiṃsu paṇḍussa narādhipassa.
anya-e1203n:897: Disvāna yo īdisakampi rāja iddhānubhāvaṃ munipuṅgavassa;
anya-e1203n:898: Pasādamattampi kareyya noce kimatthiyā tassa bhaveyya paññā.
anya-e1203n:900: Pasādanīyesu guṇesu rāja pasādanaṃ sādhujanassa dhammo;
anya-e1203n:901: Pupphanti sabbe sayameva vande samuggate komudakānanāni.
anya-e1203n:903: Vācāya tesaṃ pana dummatīnaṃ mā saggamaggaṃ pajahittha rāja;
anya-e1203n:904: Andhe gahetvā vicareyya ko hi anvesamāno supathaṃ amūḷho.
anya-e1203n:906: Narādhipā kappiṇa bimbisāra suddhodanādi api tejavantā;
anya-e1203n:907: Taṃ dhammarājaṃ saraṇaṃ upecca piviṃsu dhammāmatamādarena.
anya-e1203n:910: Upecca dhammaṃ vimalaṃ nisamma alattha āyuṃ api diṭṭhadhammo.
anya-e1203n:916: Senāpatiṃ atthavaraṃ avoca pahaṭṭhabhāvo parisāya majjhe.
anya-e1203n:919: Cirāya dulladdhipathe caranto ṭhito sarajje api vañcitohaṃ.
anya-e1203n:921: Mohena khajjopanakaṃ dhamesiṃ sītaddito dhumasikhe jalante;
anya-e1203n:922: Pipāsito sindhujalaṃ pahāya piviṃ pamādena marīcitoyaṃ.
anya-e1203n:924: Pariccajitvā amataṃ cirāya jivatthiko tikkhavisaṃ akhādiṃ;
anya-e1203n:927: Gantvāna khippaṃ parikhā samīpaṃ ārādhayitvā jinadantadhātuṃ;
anya-e1203n:928: Ānehi pūjāvidhinā karissaṃ puññāni sabbattha sukhāvahāni.
anya-e1203n:931: Dhātuṃ munindassa namassamāno ajjhesi rañño hitamā caranto
anya-e1203n:933: Cirāgataṃ diṭṭhimalaṃ pahāya alattha saddhaṃ sugate narindo;
anya-e1203n:936: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pokkharaṇī vicittā phullehi sovaṇṇasaroruhehi;
anya-e1203n:940: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbaṃ khirodakucchiṃ’va puraṃ akāsi.
anya-e1203n:943: Sandissamānā mahatā janena mahapphalaṃ mānusakaṃ akattha.
anya-e1203n:954: Vīmaṃsanatthāya tavādhunāpi mayā kataṃ sabbamidaṃ muninda;
anya-e1203n:955: Āguṃ mahantaṃ khama bhuripañña khippaṃ mamālaṅkuru uttamaṅgaṃ.
anya-e1203n:957: Patiṭṭhitā tassa tato kirīṭe maṇippabhā bhāsini dantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:958: Amuñci raṃsī dhavalā pajāsu sinehajātā iva khīradhārā.
anya-e1203n:964: Patiṭṭhapetvāna jinassa dhātuṃ pūjesi rājā ratanādikehi.
anya-e1203n:967: Hitvā vihiṃsaṃ karuṇādhivāso ārādhayī sabbajanaṃ guṇehi.
anya-e1203n:972: Vaḍḍhesi so dhātugharamhi dhātuṃ alaṅkaritvā sakalaṃ purampi;
anya-e1203n:973: Sesena pūjāvidhinā atitto pūjesi raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhoggaṃ.
anya-e1203n:1020: Nikhila guṇa nivāso so kumāro karitvā;
anya-e1203n:1051: Nahi sati mama dehe dhātumaññassa dassaṃ,
anya-e1203n:1052: Ahamapi yadi jetuṃ neva te sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
anya-e1203n:1059: Tavaca mamaca ko vā sīhaḷe bandhubhūto,
anya-e1203n:1069: Mama ca piyasahāyo so mahāsena rājā,
anya-e1203n:1087: Turita turita bhūto so puramhā paḷāyi.
anya-e1203n:1258: Itthaṃ buddhisute bhujaṅgajanitaṃ bhītiṃ sametvā gate,
anya-e1203n:1259: Sā nāvā pavanā pakampitadhajā tuṅgaṃ taraṅgāvaliṃ;
anya-e1203n:1287: Sabbā disā ca vidisā ca ghanandhakārā
anya-e1203n:1483: Sabbe’pi te atha nikāya nivāsi bhikkhū,
anya-e1203n:1489: Rājā avo ca puna bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe;
anya-e1203n:1550: Tuṭṭhā tahiṃ yatigaṇā manujā ca sabbe,
